name: European Seed Association
goal:
ESA is the voice of the European seed sector, representing the interests of those active in research, breeding, production and marketing of seeds of agricultural, horticultural and ornamental plant species.

ESA's mission is to work for:

fair and proportionate regulation of the European seed sector;
freedom of choice for its customers (farmers, growers, industry, consumers) in supplying seeds as a result of innovative, diverse technologies and production methods;
effective protection of intellectual property rights relating to plants and seeds.
interests: Agriculture, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: All EU initiatives, policies and legislative files touching upon plant breeding (including research and development), seed production, seed trade and seed marketing.
